items.sentence: I think you ought to let Tom go to Boston by himself.
I thought you said you wanted to do that by yourself.

Why didn\'t Tom tell us that he was going to be late?
Tom doesn\'t have many pictures of himself as a baby.
I can\'t get married without my parents\' permission.
I can\'t study anywhere in my house. It\'s too noisy.
There\'s not enough space in my car for anybody else.
This is the first time I\'ve seen anything like this.
Tom and Mary aren\'t quite sure what to make of this.
Tom and Mary don\'t eat out as often as they used to.
Tom pretended that he didn\'t see what was happening.
Tom doesn\'t have to do anything he doesn\'t want to.
I\'ve come to warn you about what\'s going to happen.
How do you know that light travels faster than sound?

I began to be afraid you would never come back again.
Are you going to go to Tom\'s concert tomorrow night?
Did you know you are stronger than you think you are?
I like pinto beans, but I don\'t eat them very often.
I think Mary wants me to kiss her, but I\'m not sure.
I think Tom doesn\'t have the courage to oppose Mary.
They found a secluded beach where they spent the day.
They stopped talking as soon as I came into the room.
Tom\'s opinions don\'t carry much weight around here.
Everyone\'s waiting nervously to see what\'ll happen.
A house without books is like a room without windows.
A winter sport that many people enjoy is ice skating.
All I want to do is close my eyes and get some sleep.
It was difficult for Tom to convince Mary to do that.
Our French teacher only uses French in the classroom.
I think that\'s exactly what Tom is expecting you do.
My friends say I speak better French when I\'m drunk.
I guess I should\'ve known Tom wasn\'t going to help.

Tom was the one who convinced Mary to try to do that.

Even though we\'re divorced, we\'ve remained friends.
For me, being a doctor isn\'t a job, it\'s a calling.
Tom stopped laughing when he noticed Mary was crying.

Tom suggested that we have a farewell party for Mary.
Tom suggested that we try doing this a different way.
Tom taught French in Boston before moving to Chicago.
Tom had almost forgotten all about what had happened.
